Package pulse.util

Interface Saveable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Describable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExperimentalData, HeatingCurve, Log, LogPane, Metadata, Result, ResultTable
    public interface Saveable
extends Describable
    A Saveable is any individual PULsE entity that can be saved using a FileOutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void askToSave​(javax.swing.JFrame parentWindow, java.lang.String fileTypeLabel)
      Provides a JFileChooser for the user to select the export destiation for this Saveable.
      static Extension[] getAllSupportedExtensions()  
      default Extension getDefaultExportExtension()
      Gets the default export extension for this Saveable.
      default Extension[] getSupportedExtensions()
      Returns an array of supported extensions, which by default contains only the default extension.
      void printData​(java.io.FileOutputStream fos, Extension extension)  
      default void save​(java.io.File directory, Extension extension)
      Saves the contents to directory without asking a confirmation from the user.

      • save

        default void save​(java.io.File directory,
                  Extension extension)
        Saves the contents to directory without asking a confirmation from the user.
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory where this Saveable needs to be saved.

      • askToSave

        default void askToSave​(javax.swing.JFrame parentWindow,
                       java.lang.String fileTypeLabel)
        Provides a JFileChooser for the user to select the export destiation for this Saveable.
        Parameters:
        parentWindow - the parent frame.
        fileTypeLabel - the label describing the specific type of files that will be saved.
